author: thorsten
msg: Adding support for svn log files to the project plugin. This work is based on the svn support which we have over in Lenya. The biggest problem with the lenya way was till now that we had one big log file that included 4 years of commits and building the file took more then 30 min. To overcome this problem I extended the project plugin with svn log processing which gives handy ways of creating smaller files and have a per month view of the svn changes.

author: jdillon
msg: Clean before tests as an itty bitty hack to make sure repeatable builds
Added life-cycle to close the db on stop
Optimize query w/artifact a bit more
